en.answer:
They will remain in Attack Position.

~~~

Similarly, if you Summon one of the following monsters in Attack Position while the effect of Number 41: Bagooska the Terribly Tired Tapir is applying, they will remain in Attack Position:
● Vennominaga the Deity of Poisonous Snakes
● Zushin the Sleeping Giant
● Numeral Hunter
● Xyz Avenger
● The Legendary Exodia Incarnate
● The Winged Dragon of Ra - Immortal Phoenix
● Ancient Gear Howitzer
● Lyrilusc - Independent Nightingale
● Tatsunoko
● Blackwing Full Armor Master
● Wonky Quartet
● Kikinagashi Fucho
● Paleozoic Anomalocaris
● Paleozoic Opabinia
● Timaeus the Knight of Destiny
● CXyz Simon the Great Moral Leader
● Giant Soldier of Steel
● Raidraptor - Ultimate Falcon
● Raidraptor - Rising Rebellion Falcon
● Performapal Odd-Eyes Metal Claw (if it was Fusion Summoned with Polymerization)
● The Legendary Fisherman II (if Umi is on the field)
● Dark Guardian (if it was Special Summoned by Dark Element)
● Ultra Beetrooper Absolute Hercules (if it was Fusion Summoned)
● Geomathmech Final Sigma (if it is in the Extra Monster Zone)
● Number 59: Crooked Cook (if you control no other cards)
● Number 86: Heroic Champion - Rhongomyniad (if it has 3+ materials)
● Super Quantal Mech King Great Magnus (if it has 4+ materials with different names)
● Number C62: Neo Galaxy-Eyes Prime Photon Dragon (with <<9729>> as material)
● Raidraptor - Final Fortress Falcon (with a "Raidraptor" Xyz Monster as material)
en.question: If the『change all face-up monsters on the field to Defense Position』effect of Number 41: Bagooska the Terribly Tired Tapir, or of Scareclaw Tri-Heart, is applying, what happens if a Master Peace, the True Dracoslaying King, or a Metaltron XII, the True Dracombatant, is Tribute Summoned in face-up Attack Position by Tributing a monster?
en.title: If a monster, which is『unaffected by monster effects』, is Summoned in Attack Position while Number 41: Bagooska the Terribly Tired Tapir's effect is applying, what happens?

ja.question: 「<<13163>>」の『②：このカードがモンスターゾーンに守備表示で存在する限り、フィールドの表側表示モンスターは守備表示になり、守備表示モンスターが発動した効果は無効化される』永続効果や、「<<17160>>」の『①：フィールドの表側表示モンスターは守備表示になる』永続効果が適用されている状況で、モンスターカードをリリースして攻撃表示でアドバンス召喚した「<<12938>>」や「<<12939>>」の表示形式はどうなりますか？
ja.title: 「<<13163>>」の②の効果が適用されている状況で、モンスター効果を受けないモンスターを攻撃表示で出した場合、どうなりますか？
